summary: Audited 13 scenarios. Likely valid for AI generation: 2. Likely misaligned (need stock footage): 11. Unknown: 0.

scenarios.name: Break-In Attempt
scenarios.recommendation: Use stock footage from Pexels (search: 'security camera suspicious person') | Use staged test footage with actors | Consider using --source=stock for Pexels/Pixabay footage, or update expected_labels.json to match actual generated content | Stock footage of people in winter clothing can work as proxy
scenarios.notes: Weapons will NOT be visible in AI-generated images due to safety policies | Aggressive/violent poses will be sanitized by AI image generators | Criminal activity depiction may be softened or refused

scenarios.recommendation: AI-generated images should work well for this scenario.
